weka.dl4j.distribution

Class LogNormalDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.distribution.Distribution<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.distribution.LogNormalDistribution>
      • weka.dl4j.distribution.LogNormalDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, ApiWrapper<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.distribution.LogNormalDistribution>

    public class LogNormalDistribution
extends Distribution<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.distribution.LogNormalDistribution>
implements weka.core.OptionHandler
    A version of DeepLearning4j's LogNormalDistribution that implements WEKA option handling.
